duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage payroll activities for multiple regions within a centralized payroll department, handling tax reporting, benefit administration, payroll processing, and payroll systems maintenance.
Ensure compliance with company policies and government regulations affecting payroll procedures.
Analyze and standardize payroll procedures to improve efficiency across the company.
Address payroll errors, handle complaints, and respond to inquiries for providing information.
Communicate with internal and external parties to ensure accurate processing of payroll deductions/garnishments.
Maintain payroll information, files, and records in written and electronic formats for compliance and audit trail purposes.
Reconcile account balances and prepare payroll-related documents for documentation and compliance requirements.
Monitor payroll activities to ensure effective department functioning and compliance with financial and administrative requirements.
Prepare and complete bi-weekly payrolls for all regions.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree (Bachelor's preferred) and a minimum of 4 years of experience in payroll or closely related field.
